function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interference from devices using 2.4 GHz radio frequencies can reduce Wi-Fi speed or cause loss of internet connection.","Impact":"Reduced speed or loss of internet connection can disrupt communication and access to information.","Mitigation":"Use 5 GHz wireless frequency to reduce interference, or reposition router and devices to minimize interference.","Technologies":"5 GHz wireless frequency technology, channel selection, and interference detection software.","People":"Users of Wi-Fi, especially in homes with multiple 2.4 GHz devices.","Owner":"Homeowners, IT professionals, or network administrators."},{"Description":"Wi-Fi networks can be used for location tracing during the ongoing pandemic.","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and security concerns if Wi-Fi location tracing is not regulated or secured.","Mitigation":"Implement privacy and security measures, such as encryption, user consent, and secure data handling protocols.","Technologies":"Wi-Fi location tracing software, encryption algorithms, and secure data transmission protocols.","People":"Users who may be subject to location tracing, data privacy advocates, and regulatory authorities.","Owner":"Developers of Wi-Fi location tracing technology, network operators, and regulatory authorities."}]}
